Definitely trendy -- a colorful menu that seems straight out of a chain or franchise; the building has been renovated in an urban chic style that exposes the unadorned brick of the original walls.  The food is excellent and varied.  We had Corazón Partió, the Aubergine Cake and the Aubergine Millefeuille, all of which were excellent.  The service was also very professional, and very accommodating of my limited Spanish, switching to English when necessary.
